content:
Happy Women's Day to all the incredible women out there! 🎉👩‍🦱👩‍🦰👩‍🦳 In honor of this special day, we want to remind you that the Rashtra Gaurav Tennis Tournament 2023 is open to women of all ages and skill levels. 🎾💪 Whether you're a seasoned player or just starting out, there's a category for you to compete in.

Join us on April 8th and 9th at the Noida Stadium for an unforgettable tennis tournament. With categories like Women's Open Singles and Doubles, Mixed Doubles Open, and Men's Open, there's something for everyone. 🏆👩‍❤️‍👨🧑‍🦱

Not only will you have the chance to showcase your tennis skills, but you'll also be in the running for a cash prize of Rs. 10,000 for the winners and Rs. 6,000 for the runners-up. 💰👀

So what are you waiting for? Contact us now at 📞 9818224484 or 9910809010 📞 to register and be a part of this amazing event. Let's celebrate Women's Day by showing off our talent and love for tennis at the Rashtra Gaurav Tennis Tournament! 💖🎾🎉 #RashtraGauravTennisTournament2023 #WomensDay #WomenInSports #TennisLove #CompeteAndWin #RegisterNow #JoinTheFun #RGT
